Name: hereditary spherocytosis type 1
Definition: A hereditary spherocytosis that has_material_basis_in an autosomal dominant mutation of ANK1 on chromosome 8p11.21.

Name: hereditary spherocytosis type 2
Definition: A hereditary spherocytosis that has_material_basis_in an autosomal dominant mutation of SPTB on chromosome 14q23.3.

Name: hereditary spherocytosis type 3
Definition: A hereditary spherocytosis that has_material_basis_in an autosomal dominant mutation of SPTA1 on chromosome 1q23.1.

Name: hereditary spherocytosis type 4
Definition: A hereditary spherocytosis that has_material_basis_in an autosomal dominant mutation of SLC4A1 on chromosome 17q21.31.

Name: hereditary spherocytosis type 5
Definition: A hereditary spherocytosis that has_material_basis_in a mutation of EPB42 on chromosome 15q15.2.
